title: Teemo traps does 70% damage with DFT.....
body:
Late game, stepping on teemo trap burns so much with deathfire touch and Liandries that it does 70% damage to squishies. On top of that, combined with Rylies, the slow is ridicules. No other ability in the game does that.

Then suddenly, teemo appears out of nowhere to seal your fate.

This gameplay mechanic is completely unfun/unhealthy for anyone on the receiving end. Even if teemo is not near by, he can also proc {{item:3285}} twice for more damage.

I think Teemo is unhealty and needs a rework...

replies.body: he is talking about traps.... read before you post.

He did.  Most of what he mentioned was specific to counter Teemo Mushrooms.
Lens?  Disables traps
Control Wards? Disables Traps
Magic Resist? Well... shrooms do mgk dmg.
Zhonya's?  You can Zhonya's quite a lot of the damage.
no all u need to coutner teemo period is banshees veil and banner of command. why becuase he cant damage the magic cs u promote becuase there immune to magice damage

His argument was that it does too much damage to squishy champions.  Banshee's plus banner are not squishy champion items.  You really have a tendency of saying shit completely off topic to try to make people feel like they are wrong.  You did it on another post as well.  Its obnoxious.
all u had stated was teemo is squishy ... that has nothing to do with post

I did not state anything, im refering to the above comment posted by someone else.

His first 2 lines, read it.

As annoying as Teemo is he is easy to counter late game. If Support and Jungle alone has a sweeper late game you basically disable his shrooms with constant sweeping. Give Top a sweeper too and he is basically a useless AP  Marksman with short range.

> [{quoted}](name=Yung Hulu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0WE3VRB5,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-01-12T19:54:34.208+0000)
>
> As annoying as Teemo is he is easy to counter late game. If Support and Jungle alone has a sweeper late game you basically disable his shrooms with constant sweeping. Give Top a sweeper too and he is basically a useless AP  Marksman with short range.

He still has that Blind, which is really annoying if you're trying to carry your team as someone who relies on auto attacks.
dft on teemo traps does not do that much damage. it will chunk half a no mr  squishie hp. but u can get orales and ignore them
but... teemo shroom already slows... and slows a lot harder than rylais... why get rylais for it?!
Considering only the stronger slow is applied, Rylai's would only make a difference on his Q.

squishy champs shouldn't take a lot of damage?

buy a sweeping lens, or a control ward, or duskblade

or make your support walk the minefield

"or make your support walk the minefeild"

had a vision of an adc caitlyn pushing a sona into a minefeild.

Agreed that teemo shrooms do a bit too much damage to squishies late game when teemo is behind the game in items. Sure you can use {{item:2055}} {{item:3341}}  to try to avoid them, but eventually you are going to find one the hard way.
and 75 gold nullifies his shrooms and a free item does too stop hating on temo wtf lol
Teemo is a lot like Lee Sin/Yasuo. Riot knows he's an unhealthy champion, but they never give him any meaningful nerfs because they know the mains will cry if that happens.
Or maybe you could buy a banshee's veil, abyssal scepter, or maw of malmortius? That usually works out for me. Not to mention the second red trinket lets you basically just wipe all of his shrooms.
